text: tatha allaah ne tumase apana vachan sach kar dikhaaya hai, jab tum usakee anumati se, unahen kaat[1] rahe the, yahaan tak ki jab tumane kaayarata dikhaayee tatha (rasool ke) aadesh[2] mein vibhed kar liya aur avagya kee, isake pashchaat ki tumhen vah (vijay) dikha dee, jise tum chaahate the. tumamen se kuchh sansaar chaahate hain tatha kuchh paralok chaahate hain. phir tumhen unase pher diya, taaki tumhaaree pareeksha le aur tumhen kshama kar diya tatha allaah eemaan vaalon ke lie daanasheel hai
